Birds split from dinos earlier than thought?
 
 What the article says is that fossil evidence shows that birds diverged from dinos about 60 mya. However, genetic evidence suggests this actually occurred about 100 mya.
 
 This would be a prediction as to what fossils should be found in which strata, based on evidence gathered from genetics. See how many branches of science are covered in that little sentence?

post_info.post_title: For those asking what predictions the ToE makes:

You know full well that creationists will never ever engage in an honest debate and that the vast majority of them will never educate themselves as to what science actually says.
